channel.title: Deltascape Need a better run.bat
channel.description:
[code]@echo off start java -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui title RunServer "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\bin\java.exe" -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.18-ga-bin.jar;.\AllGoFreePortForwarding.jar server cls exit [/code]
this thing trys to auto port forward and nulls the server i tried using a regular delta run.bat and it didnt work (i know how to path and ect, easy as pie)
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/w9v4gm.jpg[/img]

item.title: Deltascape Need a better run.bat
item.dc:creator: @emtrescue emtrescue
item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

I didnt do this and I dont want to have the all go free thing to port forward but a normal run.bat doesnt run the server it like has to go through the port forward thing or shuts off. :S

Read full topic

@Sagi wrote:

There’s something wrong in your code or w.e, don’t blame the run.bat lol…

Looks like something is wrong with the port-forwarding thing…
